overview: Awesome news for K-pop fans: Lotte Family Concert is coming back June with the all-star lineup. It will take the stage at the huge Jamsil Complex Olympic Main Stadium, featuring K-pop icon as BTS, EXO, BLACKPINK, and BTOB.This is a 2-day show under the separate subtitles of "K-pop concert" and :K-wave Concert." Check when your favorite artist are performing and make the summer night's dream comes true with the K-pop vibes.
title: Lotte Family Concert 2018
